creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: black border; two sections; top section has center black silk square with red cotton border on three sides; floral satin stitch in pink, green, purple and white; bottom section has diagonal red cotton squares and blue and green silk triangles embroidered as above; bottom has 16 green plastic buttons as trim; unlined
title: Baby Carrier
